title: Mastering Java For Loops
description: This module introduces you to Java for loops, a fundamental concept for iterative programming. You'll learn to write basic loops and apply them to solve common coding problems.

metadata.title: Need Help?
metadata.description: Progressive hint disclosure with multiple tiers

hints.text: Remember the basic structure of a for loop: initialization, condition, increment/decrement. Think about what values you need to iterate through.
For the first problem, you need to print numbers from 1 to 5. Your loop variable `i` should start at 1, continue as long as `i <= 5`, and increment `i` by 1 in each step.
For the sum problem, initialize a 'sum' variable to 0. Inside the loop, add the current loop variable `i` to 'sum' in each iteration. The loop should go from 1 to 10.
